```{r}
library(ggplot2)
#filter the dataset for the years 2019-2021 using the 'Region' column
filtered_data <- dataset[dataset$Year %in% c(2019, 2020, 2021), ]

#time series plot on pop 
ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x=Year, y=Population, color=Name, group=Name)) +
  geom_line(size=1.2) +
  geom_point(size=3) +
  labs(title="Population Trends from 2019-2021",
       x="Year",
       y="Population",
       color="Country") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(2019, 2020, 2021)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=45, hjust=1))
ggsave("population_trends_2019-2021.png", width = 10, height = 6)
```

```{r}
#create the scatter plot for Net Migration Rate on Year
ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x=Year, y=`Net.Migration.Rate`, color=Name, group=Name)) +
  geom_point(size=3) +
  geom_line(size=1.2) +
  labs(title ="Net Migration Rate Years (2019-2021)",
       x="Year",
       y="Net Migration Rate",
       color="Country") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(2019, 2020, 2021)) +
  theme_minimal()
ggsave("net_migration_rate_2019-2021.png", width = 10, height = 6)
```

```{r}
#Net Migration Rate vs Crude Death Rate
ggplot(clean_data, aes(x=`Crude.Death.Rate`, y=`Net.Migration.Rate`, color=Name)) +
  geom_point(size=3) +  
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE, color="black", aes(group=Name)) + 
  labs(title= "Net Migration Rate vs Crude Death Rate",
       x= "Crude Death Rate",
       y= "Net Migration Rate",
       color= "Country") +
  theme_minimal()

ggsave("net_migration_vs_crude_death_rate.png", width= 10, height = 6)
```
